name: AI SDLC Method Marketplace
description: Complete AI-assisted software development lifecycle with requirement traceability, multi-stage agent orchestration, and homeostatic quality enforcement
author: foolishimp

plugins.name: aisdlc-methodology
plugins.description: Complete AI SDLC methodology with 7-stage lifecycle, 42 skills, 7 agents, 8 commands, and 4 hooks. Consolidates all core, requirements, design, code, testing, runtime, and principles skills with full traceability and homeostatic control.

plugins.name: aisdlc-core-gemini
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Core - Requirement Traceability Foundation (Gemini)
plugins.description: Foundation plugin providing requirement traceability with REQ-* key patterns, coverage detection (sensor), and key propagation (actuator). Essential foundation for all AI SDLC plugins.

plugins.name: aisdlc-methodology-gemini
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Methodology - Multi-Stage Agent Configuration (Gemini)
plugins.description: Complete AI SDLC methodology with 7-stage agent configurations: Requirements, Design, Tasks, Code (TDD), System Test (BDD), UAT (BDD), Runtime Feedback. Integrates Key Principles and full lifecycle traceability.

plugins.name: aisdlc-core-codex
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Core - Requirement Traceability Foundation (Codex)
plugins.description: Codex-native foundation providing requirement traceability with REQ-* key patterns, coverage detection (sensor), and key propagation (actuator).

plugins.name: aisdlc-methodology-codex
plugins.displayName: AI SDLC Methodology - Multi-Stage Agent Configuration (Codex)
plugins.description: Codex-native 7-stage AI SDLC methodology with Requirements, Design, Tasks, Code (TDD), System Test (BDD), UAT (BDD), and Runtime Feedback configurations.

architecture.traceability_flow: Intent → Requirements → Design → Tasks → Code → Tests → Runtime → Feedback Loop
core_patterns: REQ-* key propagation through all stages
Homeostatic sensors detect gaps, actuators fix them
Seven Questions Checklist enforces Key Principles
BDD scenarios validate requirements in business language
